Thanks!

Thanks!

Will seed 3 times the file size.
@n1 - Who cares about the file size?!? The main point is ettv is using the archaic .avi, while eztv has the superior mp4.

About anon73a: Not sure what this blithering idiot is going on about. AVI/MP4 is just a wrapper. The actual codec can be anything. Using MP4 over AVI as the wrapper has a few advantages in terms of extra features such as subtitles etc, but aside from that it is exactly the same.
